ext_desc.message: You can add numbering to your YouTube Super Chat and make some style adjustments.

popup_about_desc.message: This extension is a Chrome extension that allows you to make some style adjustments, including adding numbering to your YouTubeYouTube Super Chat. It can be used with the Chromium browser.

popup_settings_main_select_numbering_len.message: Longer strings are less likely to be duplicated.

popup_settings_WrapSuperChat_help.message: If the entire screen display area is filled with super chat, it is recommended to adjust the maximum height by specifying max-height.

popup_settings_HideSuperChatPrice_label_.message: "Hide user avatar image" setting is OFF

popup_settings_AddSuperChatAvatarBlur_la.message: Add blur to user avatar image

popup_settings_AddChatAvatarBlur_label.message: Add blur to user avatar image

popup_settings_ShrinkChatMessage_label.message: Shrink message interval in chat field

popup_settings_ChangeChatFontSize_label.message: Change font size of chat field

popup_image_caption.message: Some UI designs and functions may differ depending on the version.

popup_notwork_desc.message: If the YouTube page specifications (DOM structure) change, it may not work properly. In that case, support in the web store or @_cofus .

popup_support.message: Bug reports and suggestions are welcome!

content_menu_AddSuperChatNumbering_re_ap.message: Reapplied 'Add numbering to Super Chat' function
